Cybersecurity and Cloud Computing

Posted on: Wed Nov 06 2024 18:00:00 GMT-0500 (Eastern Standard Time)

Category: Technology

Cloud computing has become a very important foundation in a modern business, securing cloud-based applications has never been more important. The cloud offers flexibility and scalability however, the cloud also comes with some vulnerabilities such as data breaches. In order to make sure these risks donâ€™t come. The implementation of advanced security practices will be important:

  • Authentication: The use of multi-factor authentication and role-based controls
  • Encryption: Encrypting data at rest and in transit, manage encryption keys
  • Monitoring: Add tools to track unusual activity and add some automation for security updates.

In my cloud development course we had an assignment where we had to build a secure cloud storage solution for healthcare data with the usage of Amazon S3. We enabled server-side encryption and strict access controls with the solution meeting HIPAA standards and protecting patient records.

Technology is always evolving, and the future of the cloud security can be focused on with AI driven threats. Therefore, making security for cloud-based applications very crucial now and in the future.
